Package com.example.repository

Interface SongRepository

@RepositoryDefinition(domainClass=Song.class, idClass=java.lang.Long.class) public interface SongRepository
Repository for working with the Song entity. This interface provides methods for performing various operations on songs, such as searching by name, artist, album, as well as adding and removing songs from the database.

  • Method Details

    • findById

      @Query("select song.*, artist.nickname as artist_name, jenre.jenre_name from song join artist using (artist_id) join jenre using (jenre_id) where song_id = :songId") Optional<Song> findById(@Param("songId") long songId)
      Find a song by its ID.
      Parameters:
      songId - the ID of the song
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the found song or empty if the song is not found

    • existsById

      @Query("select exists(select 1 from song where song_id = :songId)") boolean existsById(@Param("songId") long songId)
      Check if a song exists with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      songId - the ID of the song
      Returns:
      true if the song exists, otherwise false

    • count

      @Query("select count(*) from song") int count()
      Count the total number of songs in the database.
      Returns:
      the total number of songs

    • countByNameContaining

      @Query("select count(*) from song where song_name like \'%\' || :name || \'%\' ") int countByNameContaining(String name)
      Count the number of songs whose name contains the given string.
      Parameters:
      name - the string to search in the song names
      Returns:
      the number of songs whose name contains the given string

    • findByArtistId

      @Query("select song.*, artist.nickname as artist_name, jenre.jenre_name as jenre_name from song join artist using (artist_id) join jenre using (jenre_id) where artist_id = :artistId") List<Song> findByArtistId(@Param("artistId") long artistId)
      Find songs by the artist's ID.
      Parameters:
      artistId - the ID of the artist
      Returns:
      a list of songs by the artist with the given ID

    • findByAlbumId

      @Query("select song.*, artist.nickname as artist_name, jenre.jenre_name as jenre_name from song join artist using (artist_id) join jenre using (jenre_id) join album_songs using (song_id) WHERE album_id = :albumId") List<Song> findByAlbumId(@Param("albumId") long albumId)
      Find songs by the album's ID.
      Parameters:
      albumId - the ID of the album
      Returns:
      a list of songs from the album with the given ID

    • findByUserId

      @Query("select song.*, artist.nickname as artist_name, jenre.jenre_name as jenre_name from song join artist using (artist_id) join jenre using (jenre_id) join person_favourite_song using (song_id) WHERE person_id = :userId") List<Song> findByUserId(@Param("userId") long userId)
      Find songs by the user's ID (user's favorite songs).
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      a list of songs that are favorites of the user with the given ID

    • findByNameContaining

      @Query("select song.*, artist.nickname as artist_name, jenre.jenre_name as jenre_name from song join artist using (artist_id) join jenre using (jenre_id) WHERE song_name like \'%\' || :name || \'%\' LIMIT :limit OFFSET :offset") List<Song> findByNameContaining(@Param("name") String name, @Param("offset") int offset, @Param("limit") int limit)
      Find songs whose name contains the given string with pagination.
      Parameters:
      name - the string to search in the song names
      offset - the offset for pagination
      limit - the limit of results
      Returns:
      a list of songs whose name contains the given string

    • findAll

      @Query("select song.*, artist.nickname as artist_name, jenre.jenre_name as jenre_name from song join artist using (artist_id) join jenre using (jenre_id) LIMIT :limit OFFSET :offset") List<Song> findAll(@Param("offset") int offset, @Param("limit") int limit)
      Retrieve all songs with pagination.
      Parameters:
      offset - the offset for pagination
      limit - the limit of results
      Returns:
      a list of all songs

    • save

      @Modifying @Query("insert into song (song_id, song_name, artist_id, genre_id) values (:songId, :songName, :artistId, :genreId)") void save(@Param("songId") long songId, @Param("songName") String songName, @Param("artistId") long artistId, @Param("genreId") long genreId)
      Save a new song to the database.
      Parameters:
      songId - the ID of the song
      songName - the name of the song
      artistId - the ID of the artist
      genreId - the ID of the genre

    • deleteById

      @Modifying @Query("delete from song where song_id = :songId") void deleteById(@Param("songId") long songId)
      Delete a song by its ID.
      Parameters:
      songId - the ID of the song
